attributes.action: admit that buying hospitals and schools under Private Finance Initiatives (PFI) is comparable to me buying a house on my credit card and telling my wife it was free.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The true cost of PFI deals is constantly and blatently misrepresented to the public. Figures are routinely manipulated using a so called 'optimism bias' to make the PFI option appear cheaper than the alternatives. Given the spiralling costs of existing PFI deals perhaps this optimism is badly misplaced.
